Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System - Meropenem 0.0313–2 μg/mL EPY
BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent meropenem (0.0313-2 μg/mL) - Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only Phoenix Panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture of aerobic and facultative anaerobic Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System with meropenem panel for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Streptococcus species.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria isolates, specifically for addition of meropenem at concentrations of 0.0313–2 μg/mL to Streptococcus ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels.
